column4: ehm... i tend to let my computer only hybernate... its cool, because I dont have to close all the programs.. save my work.. etc. BUT sometimes happens that my dad turns on the PC and accidentaly boots into ubuntu, and is left with only one choice - to restart the PC... (which by the way loses all my data that I didnt save) is there a way around this???
yeah, give your Dad a user account
